trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration preview: Simple, secure cloud partner integration | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration preview: Simple, secure cloud partner integration | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration supports your cross-company relationships by enabling business partners to selectively access your corporate applications
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration supports your cross-company relationships by enabling business partners to selectively access your corporate applications

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2B collaboration preview: Simple, secure cloud partner integration
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2B collaboration preview: Simple, secure cloud partner integration

trans-unit.source: As companies focus more on their core business, the need to partner with other businesses increases.
trans-unit.target: As companies focus more on their core business, the need to partner with other businesses increases.

trans-unit.source: Companies need to easily and securely share resources (such as access to corporate applications) with their partners to engage in effective collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Companies need to easily and securely share resources (such as access to corporate applications) with their partners to engage in effective collaboration.

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration supports your cross-company relationships by enabling partners to selectively access your corporate applications and data using their self-managed identities.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration supports your cross-company relationships by enabling partners to selectively access your corporate applications and data using their self-managed identities.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD B2B collaboration is:
trans-unit.target: Azure AD B2B collaboration is:

trans-unit.source: **Simple**: Each partner user uses an existing Azure AD account or one that is easily created during invitation acceptance.
trans-unit.target: **Simple**: Each partner user uses an existing Azure AD account or one that is easily created during invitation acceptance.

trans-unit.source: You can provide this user with direct access to your chosen corporate app or a set of applications through the App Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: You can provide this user with direct access to your chosen corporate app or a set of applications through the App Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: **Secure**: Your admin controls all access to your corporate apps through your Azure AD directory.
trans-unit.target: **Secure**: Your admin controls all access to your corporate apps through your Azure AD directory.

trans-unit.source: When collaboration is terminated, partner users can be removed from your Azure AD and their access to your apps is immediately revoked.
trans-unit.target: When collaboration is terminated, partner users can be removed from your Azure AD and their access to your apps is immediately revoked.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when the partner user leaves the partner organization, access is lost automatically.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, when the partner user leaves the partner organization, access is lost automatically.

trans-unit.source: **Free**: Azure AD B2B collaboration is a free feature that comes with Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: **Free**: Azure AD B2B collaboration is a free feature that comes with Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: The partner companies who need access to your corporate apps **do not need to have Azure AD.**
trans-unit.target: The partner companies who need access to your corporate apps **do not need to have Azure AD.**

trans-unit.source: Azure AD B2B collaboration provides a simple user sign-up experience to provide these partners with immediate access to your apps.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD B2B collaboration provides a simple user sign-up experience to provide these partners with immediate access to your apps.

trans-unit.source: Check out [the blog post announcing public preview](http://blogs.technet.com/b/ad/archive/2015/09/15/learn-all-about-the-azure-ad-b2b-collaboration-preview.aspx) and [this deep dive video](https://channel9.msdn.com/Series/Azure-Active-Directory-Videos-Demos/Azure-Active-Directory-B2B-collaboration-demo) walking through Azure AD B2B collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Check out [the blog post announcing public preview](http://blogs.technet.com/b/ad/archive/2015/09/15/learn-all-about-the-azure-ad-b2b-collaboration-preview.aspx) and [this deep dive video](https://channel9.msdn.com/Series/Azure-Active-Directory-Videos-Demos/Azure-Active-Directory-B2B-collaboration-demo) walking through Azure AD B2B collaboration.
